name: wct_dtt_freqmin
definition: The lower frequency bound to compute the dv/v from the WCT

name: wct_dtt_freqmax
definition: The upper frequency bound to compute the dv/v from the WCT

name: wct_width
definition: Width of the time lag window

name: wct_lag
definition: How is the lag window defined for WCT

name: wct_v
definition: Velocity parameter used for dynamic lag calculation

name: wct_min_nonzero
definition: Percentage of data points with non-zero weighting
